articles.title: Calls for unity ring as divided US marks 20th year of 9/11 attacks - GMA News Online
articles.description: America marked the 20th anniversary of 9/11 Saturday with pleas for unity at solemn ceremonies given added resonance by the messy withdrawal of US troops from Afghanistan and return to power of the Taliban.

articles.title: ‘An evil spectre descended’: New York marks 20th anniversary of September 11 - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Americans are not renowned for their subtlety, but the occasion was restrained and dignified. The focus was on paying tribute to victims, not politics.
articles.content:
There was a pause each time a milestone arrived: the plane striking the South Tower, the plane striking the Pentagon, the plane crashing into a field in Pennsylvania.

articles.author: Alyssa Mungcal
articles.title: How 9.11 shaped their lives - The Straits Times
articles.description: The attacks in America 20 years ago left the world shaken and unleashed a global war on terrorism. How has Sept 11 changed these six ordinary lives? Find out.
